itunes:subtitle: As we recover from the 2021 Texas Winter Storm, we're resharing one of our most popular episodes. In support of any listeners who are also recovering, we spend a few minutes at the beginning of the episode validating your emotions and feelings as you...
itunes:summary:
As we recover from the 2021 Texas Winter Storm, we're resharing one of our most popular episodes. In support of any listeners who are also recovering, we spend a few minutes at the beginning of the episode validating your emotions and feelings as you rebuild.

content:encoded:
As we recover from the 2021 Texas Winter Storm, we're resharing one of our most popular episodes. In support of any listeners who are also recovering, we spend a few minutes at the beginning of the episode validating your emotions and feelings as you rebuild.
